item.description:
2 Day Multi-Day Program - Lodging Included


Our program offers more than recipes. We care about your health and healing. Learn skills easily used at home when the training and cleanse is done. Follow-up support after the program is available and recommended for all participants.

Goals of the 2 Day Multi-Day Program:

  • Healing - Through this opportunity, you learn abundant delicious healthy food choices - Additional
  • Healing Techniques and Sessions are also given
  • Cleansing - Detox gently and replenish the body with vibrant foods - out with the old, in with the new
  • Education - Know the reasons and the science behind this food and lifestyle choice - be an educated eater
  • Immersion - Total immersion is extremely helpful to get positive healing momentum in this team supported environment - program includes lodging
  • Support and Community - Our team, as well as other participants, offer great support and a community experience to help everyone adopt these simple and effective techniques
  • Live Energy and Live Food - Vegan Nutrition and Foods together with Tong Ren energy healing, breathwork, informative talks, meditation, relaxation, sunshine, exercise and community offer an excellent environment for healing


Organic Healing Food


  • Daily Nourishing Green Juices - Efficient power packed nutrition for maximum benefit, healing and absorption - 3 times a day
  • Daily Immune-building wheatgrass juice - every morning
  • Nutritious and Delicious Green Smoothies - everyday - Vitamins, minerals and your favorite fruits and greens in a glass
  • Easy Kitchen sprouting for mung beans, lentils and others
  • Quick & Easy Sandwiches & Wraps - Purple & green cabbage wraps, nori rolls, collard rolls, romaine sandwiches, stuffed bell peppers
  • Salads and Dressings - Enjoy making and tasting a variety of salads and dressings
  • Non-dairy milk - Using ingredients like almonds or sunflower seeds, learn a better alternative to dairy milk for better nutrition and more calcium
  • Pasta techniques including Pasta Marinara meal

    Daily Activities and Training

  • Easy to learn daily exercises including Master Gao simple warm-up and stretching, Dao Yin Qi Gong, yoga, The 5 Tibetan Rites & Daily Meditation
  • Basic kitchen knife skills
  • Pasta tools and other kitchen utensils
  • Tong Ren Group Healing Treatments and Education
  • Vegan Nutrition Lectures; Healing, detox, food combining, ph balance, colon health, digestion and absorption
  • Healthy alternatives to processed sugars


Including 2 Nights Lodging - 10 hours lectures, demos and presentations - All Meals, Juices - Shared Room

Class Begins Friday Evening for Orientation and Introduction- Friday and Saturday Night Lodging Included

$895 if Booked 30 Days in advance - Otherwise $995
$800 Each For Couples - Otherwise Shared Room

For more information go to: http://www.livefoodcu...
item.name: 2 Day Multi-Day Program - Organic Healing Food
